column4: Latest;Kampot Province: At 7:45 pm on September 21
column5: a lightning strike occurred at a farmer’s house in Bos Trabek village
column8: causing the death of a man on the spot. Three of his cattle also died in the incident.------According to the police report
column11: the victim came down from the house to put grass to feed the cows in the barn
column12: when suddenly there was a lightning strike.------The victim was named as Hav Choeun
column13: 41 years old.------After authorities arrived at the scene
column14: an autopsy report found that the man had been killed by lightning and arranged for the body to be taken to the victim’s family for burial. ------KBN
